mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, PROD_CREATE_DATE, TN.IS_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_THUMBNAIL TN ON P.PROD_NO = TN.PROD_NO LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}

SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, P.PROD_CREATE_DATE, TN.IS_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_THUMBNAIL TN ON P.PROD_NO = TN.PROD_NO WHERE PROD_CATEGORY_NO = #{prodCategoryNo}

SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, C.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME, TN.IS_THUMBNAIL FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PROD_CATEGORY C ON P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO = C.PROD_CATEGORY_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_THUMBNAIL TN ON P.PROD_NO = TN.PROD_NO WHERE P.PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( USER_NO, PROD_NO, PROD_CNT) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{prodNo}, #{prodCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.USER_NO, C.PROD_NO, C.PROD_CNT, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.STOCK FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (USER_NO, CART_NO, PAYMENT, NAME, MOBILE, POSTCODE, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATE, PRICE_ALL) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{cartNo}, #{payment}, #{name}, #{mobile}, #{postcode}, #{jibunAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{orderDate}, #{orderState}, #{priceAll})
